items.quote: I believe great code is code that others can understand. I always aim for clarity over cleverness.
items.author: Code Quality
items.title: My Standard

items.quote: Every bug is a learning opportunity. I embrace mistakes as part of the growth process.
items.author: Continuous Improvement
items.title: My Approach

items.quote: The best interfaces are the ones users don't have to think about. Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
items.author: User-Centric Design

items.quote: I'm not afraid to ask questions or admit what I don't know. That's how real learning happens.
items.author: Collaborative Mindset

cta.title: Looking for a
cta.text: I'm eager to learn, grow, and contribute to real projects. If you have an opportunity or just want to connect, I'd love to hear from you.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Drop me a message and I'll get back to you soon.
contact.name: Name
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project or just say hello...
contact.heroSubtitle: Got a project idea, a question, or just want to chat? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.formSubtitle: I'll get back to you as soon as possible
contact.successMessage: Thanks for reaching out! I'll get back to you soon.

discovery.title: Listen
discovery.text: starts with understanding. I dig deep into your goals, users, and constraints before writing a single line of code.

strategy.title: Plan
strategy.text: maps the path forward. Together we define the user journey, technical approach, and success metrics.

creation.title: Build
creation.text: is where ideas become real. Clean code, thoughtful design, and constant iteration until it feels right.

refinement.title: Polish
refinement.text: makes good work great. Performance tuning, micro-interactions, and sweating the small stuff.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: I'm a developer at the beginning of my journey, and I'm loving every moment of it. There's something exciting about learning something new every day and seeing my skills grow with each project I build.
about.text2: My approach is simple: stay curious, build things, and learn from mistakes. I care about writing clean code and creating interfaces that feel good to use — even if I'm still figuring things out.
about.text3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new tools, watching tutorials, or working on side projects. I believe the best way to learn is by doing, and I'm always looking for the next challenge.

frontend.title: Frontend Craft
frontend.description: React, TypeScript, modern CSS. Building interfaces that are fast, accessible, and delightful to use.

design.title: Design Sensibility
design.description: An eye for detail and a deep appreciation for good UX. I bridge the gap between design and code.

performance.title: Performance Focus
performance.description: Speed matters. I optimize for real-world performance, not just benchmarks.

collaboration.title: Clear Communication
collaboration.description: I explain technical concepts simply and keep everyone aligned throughout the project.

projectsPage.title: My Work
projectsPage.subtitle: Projects I've built, problems I've solved

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A complete shopping experience with real-time inventory, smooth checkout, and a design that converts.

designSystem.title: Design System
designSystem.description: A comprehensive component library built for accessibility, consistency, and developer happiness.

mobileApp.title: Mobile App
mobileApp.description: Cross-platform app with offline support, real-time sync, and native-feeling interactions.

projectModal.challengeText: The goal was ambitious: create an interface that handles complex real-time data while maintaining smooth 60fps performance across all devices. The existing solution was slow and frustrating for users.
projectModal.solutionText: I rebuilt the architecture from the ground up — optimized state management, efficient rendering, and a design system that scales. Every decision was driven by real user needs and performance data.
projectModal.resultsText: 40% increase in user engagement, 60% faster load times, and feedback that made the effort worthwhile. Users actually enjoy using it now.

job1.description: Building personal projects and learning modern web technologies. Focused on React, TypeScript, and creating real-world applications.

job2.description: Contributing to open source projects and learning from the developer community.

job3.description: Completing courses on frontend development, backend basics, and best practices in software engineering.
